EmailTemplate.name: Nomex® Paper (DPTH)
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Reply: Inquiry Forwarded to BESTRADE PRECISON LIMITED
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in our product, Nomex® Paper.
Please be informed that your inquiry has already been forwarded to our distributor:
BESTRADE PRECISON LIMITED
Att: Khun Anirut Rattanavipas
Email: anirut@bestradegroup.com
701/20,22 Trok Wat Chan Nai ( Rat Uthit 1)
Bangklo, Bangklolaem, Bangkok 10120. THAILAND
Tel : (662) 281-1600
Fax : (662) 284-1591, (662) 284-1592
http://www.bestradegroup.com
Please be informed that your inquiry has already been forwarded to our expert. The process normally takes between 24-48 hours to process. Please kindly wait for the contact.
Again, thank you for contacting DuPont and we hope to be at your service again in the future.
Warm Regards, DuPont Inquiry Management Center, Asia Pacific
